data.name: MSG_SHIMMERING_START
data.value: Shimmmering light flooded the dungeon!

data.name: MSG_SHIMMERING_END
data.value: The shimmering stopped.

data.name: MSG_SHIMMERING_EFFECT_CLEAR_BODY
data.value: All Pokémon are protected from stat drops!

data.name: MSG_SHIMMERING_EFFECT_CRITICAL
data.value: All moves have a higher critical rate chance!

data.name: MSG_SHIMMERING_EFFECT_RANGE
data.value: All moves have increased range!

data.name: MSG_SHIMMERING_EFFECT_PERFECT_ACCURACY
data.value: All moves are guaranteed to hit!

data.name: MSG_SHIMMERING_EFFECT_SERENE
data.value: All moves have their additional effect chance boosted!

data.name: MSG_SHIMMERING_EFFECT_STATUS
data.value: All Pokémon are protected from status conditions!

data.name: MSG_SHIMMERING_CRYSTAL_PROTECT
data.value: {0} was protected by a mysterious power!

data.name: MSG_SHIMMERING_CRYSTAL_STAT_DROP
data.value: A mysterious power prevented {0}'s {2} from dropping!

data.name: MSG_CRYSTAL_DEFENSE_NO_MORE
data.value: {0} can't use any more Defense Crystals!

data.name: MSG_CRYSTAL_ATTACK_NO_MORE
data.value: {0} can't use any more Attack Crystals!

data.name: MSG_CRYSTAL_HEAL_NO_MORE
data.value: {0} can't use any more Drain Crystals!

data.name: MSG_CRYSTAL_DEFENSE_END
data.value: {0}'s Defense Crystal's power wore off!

data.name: MSG_CRYSTAL_ATTACK_END
data.value: {0}'s Attack Crystal's power wore off!

data.name: MSG_CRYSTAL_HEAL_END
data.value: {0}'s Drain Crystal's power wore off!

data.name: MSG_CRYSTAL_ATTACK
data.value: {0}'s Attack Crystal power rose to {1}!

data.name: MSG_CRYSTAL_DEFENSE
data.value: {0}'s Defense Crystal power rose to {1}!

data.name: MSG_CRYSTAL_HEAL
data.value: {0}'s Drain Crystal power rose to {1}!

data.name: MSG_GLOW_FOUND_ITEM
data.value: {0} found a {1}!

data.name: MSG_GLOW_FOUND_NO_ITEM
data.value: {0} didn't find an item!

data.name: WISHMAKER_NPC_TALK1
data.value: [emote=Inspired]Wow![pause=20] Wishmaker Cave is so beautiful![br][emote=Normal]Sometimes, I feel something stirring in me every time I look at the crystals.

data.name: WISHMAKER_NPC_TALK2
data.value: I could have sworn I saw something shiny on the ground earlier.[br][emote=Worried]I wish I could remember where I last saw it...

data.name: WISHMAKER_NPC_TALK3
data.value: Heh.[pause=0] These crystals can't hide from old Zangoose.[br][emote=Normal]Hidden from the plain eye, but I always check.

data.name: WISHMAKER_NPC_TALK4
data.value: [emote=Pain]Ughh, those Tentacools are nasty, [pause=20]very nasty.[br][emote=Pain]I don't know why,[pause=20] but I feel absolutely horrible after fighting one.

data.name: WISHMAKER_NPC_TALK5
data.value: Huh,[pause=20] I noticed some Pokémon here actively seek crystals to become more powerful.[br]I think it's best to use their power immediately the moment you find them.

data.name: WISHMAKER_NPC_TALK6
data.value: Rumors has it,[pause=10] something rests within the depths of this cave.[br]...[pause=30]Waiting to be awaken by explorers who can hold their wishes until the very end.
